result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Prosecutor

records.addlTxt:
Case Called: 10:31 am
INCLUDES 19CF514, 21CF1261, 21CF1300, 22CF460.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher in person:
Defendant appears in person and with Atty John Wallace in person; Interpreter Pim Lorenzetti appears via Zoom Video for Defendant. 
Interpreter sworn and interprets. 
VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. State moves to:
19CF514:
Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine-PTAC)>>DRI.
Ct. 2 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia-PTAC)>>DRI.

21CF1261:
Ct. 1 (Possess w/Intent- THC (<=200 grams)>>DRI.
Ct. 3 (BJ-Felony)>>DRI.
Ct. 4 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia)>>DRI.

21CF1300:
Ct. 1 (BJ-Felony)>>DRI.

22CF460:
Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine-PTAC)>>DRI.
Ct. 2 (Possession of THC-PTAC)>>DRI.
Ct. 3 (Maintain Drug Trafficking Place-PTAC)>>DRI.
Ct. 4 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia-PTAC)>>DRI.

COURT GRANTS ABOVE.
  
PLEA: 
21CF1261:
Ct. 2 (Possession of Methamphetamine)>> GUILTY.
Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

Atty Wallace makes statements.

COURT ORDERS: 
21CF1261:
Ct. 2 (Possession of Methamphetamine)>> Sentence W/H- 1 Years Probation. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended by DOC, AODA and Follow up, Comply with any CHIPS Orders or Conditions, I/S 60 Days Jail to be used for rule violations, Court Costs, DNA Sample and Surcharge. No objection to probation being transferred to a different State pursuant to the directions of the DOC. Court finds 8 Days Credit.

Defendant may obtain phone from Wausau PD as stated. 

Adjourned: 11:13 am
ATTIC:  Intake Report - Pretrial Services Program

Clerk Marisa. 
Case Called: 10:14 am  
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher; Deft appears in person with Atty John Wallace. 
Interpreter, Pim Pimpa Lorenzetti, sworn and interprets by Zoom Video. 
Waiver of Prelim. filed.  
Court questions deft as to waiver. 
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made. 
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial. 
Information to be E-filed. Reading Waived. 
Plea: Not Guilty. 
Plea date set for 5/4/2022 at 10:30 am in Br. 1. 
Adj: 10:18 am
